main event: On 6 March 1967, a local resident observed a large, dark, triangular shape hovering silently above the treetops in Bergenfield, New Jersey.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at approximately 7:15 PM,The object was described as dark and triangular,The object hovered silently for several minutes before drifting out of sight,On 14 March 1967, Capt. Raymond F. Fixler reported observing a bright light moving in an irregular pattern,The report was forwarded to Project Blue Book for investigation.
witness description: local resident and Air Force officer
